name: lforms-fhir-app
description: A SMART on FHIR app for lforms
devDependenciesComments: autocomplete-lhc is included only for its test helpers; for the app it is pulled in through lforms

scripts.build:preparcel: npm run build:clean && npm run build:pages
scripts.build-dev: npm run build:preparcel && cross-env PARCEL_WORKER_BACKEND=process && node bin/cross-var.js parcel build --dist-dir dist/$npm_package_name --public-url . --no-optimize
scripts.build:parcel: cross-env PARCEL_WORKER_BACKEND=process && node bin/cross-var.js parcel build --dist-dir dist/$npm_package_name --public-url .
scripts.build: npm run build:preparcel && npm run build:parcel && npm run build:version
scripts.prestart: node bin/cross-var.js echo "Website starting at http://localhost:8000/$npm_package_name"
